fullplot: A look at the life of French designer Yves Saint Laurent from the beginning of his career in 1958 when he met his lover and business partner, Pierre Berge.
plot: A look at the life of French designer Yves Saint Laurent from the beginning of his career in 1958 when he met his lover and business partner, Pierre Berge.
title: Yves Saint Laurent

tomatoes.consensus: While it boasts its share of fine performances, Yves Saint Laurent is also disappointingly bland and formulaic -- especially given its subject's dazzling reputation.
